text: Say, �I will give you [one] admonition: that you stand before God, in twos and singly...�He said:The reckoning on the Day of Resurrection is [an appraisal of] four things: veracity (ṣidq) in speech, sincerity (ikhlāṣ) in actions, rectitude (istiqāma) with God in all affairs, and heedfulness(murāqaba) of God in every situation. But, God, Glorified and Exalted is He, knows best. His words, Exalted is He:
